content: ribbed far-away baby socks here is the pattern for ribbed far-away baby socks as it made its public debut on thursday january 17 2008 on the afghans for afghans knit- and crochet- along blog at http //afghansforafghanskal blogspot com/2008/01/ribbed-far- away-baby-socks html please note that this blog has moved and is now located at http //afghansforafghansknitalong blogspot com/ the instep stitches continue the ribbing from the leg for an extra bit of stretch the short-row heel eliminates picking up stitches though i found it the hardest part of the pattern to write up this pattern is for personal use or for charity i reserve all rights ribbed far-away baby socks size finished foot length 3 5 9 cm needles 3 75 mm u s 5 dpn or size to give gauge yarn any light worsted weight gauge 6 sts per inch 2 5 cm in stockinette stitch abbreviations dpn double-pointed needles co cast on k knit p purl yf yarn forward as if to purl yb yarn back as if to knit sl slip st stitch sts stitches lh left-hand rem remaining cont continue note slip stitches as if to purl - 2 - cuff co 24 sts join in round work in k1 p1 ribbing until work measures 2 5 cm or desired length short row heel redistribute stitches as follows 1st needle 12 stitches 2nd needle 6 stitches 3rd needle 6 stitches heel is worked on 1st needle row 1 k11 yf sl next st yb sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 2 p10 yb sl next st yf sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 3 k9 yf sl next st yb sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 4 p8 yb sl next st yf sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 5 k7 yf sl next st yb sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 6 p6 yb sl next st yf sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 7 k6 yf sl next st yb sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 8 p7 yb sl next st yf sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 9 k8 yf sl next st yb sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 10 p9 yb sl next st yf sl wrapped st back to lh needle turn row 11 k10 yf sl next st yb turn row 12 p11 yb sl next st yf turn - 3 - foot knit across 12 stitches of 1st needle if there is a gap between the heel stitches and the instep stitches it helps to pick up a stitch to knit together with the first and last instep stitches k1 p1 6 times instep cont in pattern keeping instep stitches in k1 p1 rib and sole stitches in stockinette stitch until work measures 2 5 cm from back of heel toe shaping round 1 k4 k2tog 4 times 20 sts rem
